channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Theodore M. Giannaros

item.title: 20+19 quotes for the new year
item.description: “Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.” (Chris Grosser) “Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.” (Rober Collier) “The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.” (Vidal Sassoon) “When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.” (Henry Ford) “Fall seven times and stand up eight.” (Japanese proverb) “The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

item.title: Quote of the Day: October 28 2018
item.description: The devil whispered in my ear, “you’re not strong enough to withstand the storm”. I responded by whispering in the devil’s ear, “I am the storm”.
